document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a4c4ff">Air </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">has </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">no </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#04c8ff">Residence, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">no </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c89430">Neighbor, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">No </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c06cff">Ear, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">no </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#58d4e8">Door, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">No </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a4c4ff">Apprehension </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Another </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Oh, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff04c4">Happy </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a4c4ff">Air! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94d4f0">Etherial </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c89430">Guest </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">at </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">e'en </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">an </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a4c4ff">Outcast's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94d4f0">Pillow </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7c38ff">Essential </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#04c8ff">Host, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#04c8ff">Life's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c89430">faint, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#04c8ff">wailing </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#04c8ff">Inn, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Later </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">than </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#6cffa8">Light </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">thy </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c89430">Consciousness </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#04c8ff">accost </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Me </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Till </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a4c4ff">depart, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a4c4ff">persuading </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Mine </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Air has no residence, no neighbor
